```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(tmap)
library(lubridate)
library(janitor)
library(sf)
```

## Read in the data

```{r}
ca_oil_spills <- read_csv(here("data", "oil_spill_incident_tracking.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  rename(object_id = objectid,
         dfg_control = dfgcontrol)

ca_counties <- read_sf(here("data", "ca_counties", "ca_counties.shp")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```
